titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation commanding all masters and owners of ships to stay for their convoy before they put to sea
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our honour at Hampton Court, the twenty third day of June, 1681. In the three and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
